title: As You Wish: Story of Kunning Palace
overview: The drama series "Story of Kunning Palace" is planning a team-building trip in Sanya for three days and two nights with eight of its main cast members. They will not only experience pirate-themed activities but also take on various game tasks combined with the plot. The loser of each game will receive a punishment written by the female lead's "magical pen." Finally, they will hold a themed concert for the audience.
